questions: At which level of government in India 1/3 of seats are reserved for women ?
By what term is now the person known who believes in equal rights and opportunities for women.  		Define a feminist ?
answers: Feminism : The movement concerned with the empowerment of women and giving women equal status in the society as men.

questions: In which constitutional institution have seats been reserved for women ?
The concept of patriarchy refers to which system ?
answers: A system that values men more than women.

questions: What is the aim of ‘feminist movements’ ?
According to the 2001 census, what was the sex ratio in India ?
In which country is the participation of women in public life very high ?
What is the literacy rate amount the Indian women ?
What do you mean by a patriarchal society ?
Name the group of countries in which participation of women in public life is very high.
How much representation do local governments provide for women in India ?
answers: Women have one-third seats reserved in local selfgovernment bodies.
